import React, {Compoent} from 'react' import {LinkContainer} from 'react-router-bootstrap' import {Navbar, Nav, Container, NavDropdown} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' const Header = () => { const dispatch =useDispatch() const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.user) const {userInfo} = userLogin const logoutHandler = ()=> { console.log("Logged Out") } return ( ProShop
{userInfo ? ( Profile Logout ): }
) } export default Header
